All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ApiKeyClient
Client for testing API key validity in Loops.
ApiKeyTestResponse
Response from testing an API key.
Contact
Represents a contact in Loops.
ContactCreateRequest
Request to create a new contact in Loops.
ContactDeleteRequest
Request to delete a contact from Loops.
ContactFindRequest
Request to find a contact in Loops.
ContactPropertiesClient
Client for managing custom contact properties in Loops.
ContactProperty
Represents a custom contact property definition in Loops.
ContactPropertyCreateRequest
Request to create a new custom contact property in Loops.
ContactPropertyResponse
Response from creating a custom contact property.
ContactResponse
Response from creating, updating, or deleting a contact.
ContactsClient
Client for managing contacts in Loops.
ContactUpdateRequest
Request to update an existing contact in Loops.
DedicatedIpsClient
Client for viewing dedicated sending IP addresses in Loops.
EventResponse
Response from sending an event to Loops.
EventsClient
Client for sending events in Loops.
EventSendRequest
Request to send an event to Loops.
HttpMethod
 
LoopsApiException
Thrown when the Loops API returns an error response.
LoopsClient
Main client for interacting with the Loops API.
LoopsClient.Builder
Builder for constructing a LoopsClient instance.
LoopsValidationException
Thrown when client-side validation fails before making an API request.
MailingList
Represents a mailing list in Loops.
MailingListsClient
Client for managing mailing lists in Loops.
NoopTransport
 
OkHttpTransport
Default HTTP transport implementation using OkHttp.
RateLimitExceededException
Thrown when the Loops API rate limit has been exceeded (HTTP 429).
RequestOptions
Optional request configuration for API calls.
TransactionalClient
Client for sending and managing transactional emails in Loops.
TransactionalEmail
Represents a transactional email template in Loops.
TransactionalListResponse
Response containing a list of transactional email templates.
TransactionalListResponse.Pagination
Pagination information for navigating through transactional email results.
TransactionalResponse
Response from sending a transactional email.
TransactionalSendRequest
Request to send a transactional email via Loops.
TransactionalSendRequest.Attachment
Represents a file attachment for a transactional email.
Transport
Interface for HTTP transport implementations in the Loops SDK.
TransportRequest
Represents an HTTP request to be executed by a transport layer.
TransportResponse
Represents an HTTP response from the transport layer.
